name: phonebook-backend
description: Backend project for the phonebook React project

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../'part 2'/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../../'part 3'/'Phonebook backend'/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: David Gvetadze
